name: Dodge Them
description:
Dodge Them is a simple arcade game where collecting points and dodging a crazed driver is the name of the game. Make one mistake, BOOM!

Vehicle must stay in lane and move when the road opens up. Plan moves in advance before reaching open road. Progress to next round, after collecting all the dots on screen. The crazed driver gets progressively road raged so watch out.

Dodge Them is absolutely free for everyone. Enjoy!

Any questions or concerns? Email us: kimun8tytech@gmail.com
